unnormalised: Hey, any news on Jadeja's knee? Remember that injury during the Asia Cup? Hope he's fit for the upcoming series! Heard Bumrah's back issue is also concerning. Last I saw, they said recovery would take a few months. Hopefully, NCA is on top of things, unlike that "Lagaan" plot twist. Wishing them a speedy recovery! Also, any updates on Arshdeep's ankle sprain from the recent Ranji trophy match? It was near Mohali, wasn't it?
normalised: Hey, any news on Jadeja's knee? Remember that injury during the Asia Cup? Hope he's fit for the upcoming series! Heard Bumrah's back issue is also concerning. Last I saw, they said recovery would take a few months. Hopefully, N C A is on top of things, unlike that "Lagaan" plot twist. Wishing them a speedy recovery! Also, any updates on Arshdeep's ankle sprain from the recent Ranji trophy match? It was near Mohali, wasn't it?
